Messages.Body:
Dear person,

I am writing to let you know that I will not be able to attend the meeting
scheduled for 3 PM today. Could we please postpone it to another time?

Thank you for your understanding.

Best regards,
Aryan

okay no issue
we can reschedule it tomorrow if you are okay with that
regards

On Tue, Jul 29, 2025 at 3:51 PM Aryan Katoch <aryankatoch22440@gmail.com>
wrote:

>

I will not be available tomorrow. I'm on leave lets do it today.
